forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then becoming windy with a steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with a steady, soaking rain overnight. Increasing winds. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
